Name: TRIBE_BAND
Description: Survival in small groups (Dunbar number) | Kinship/Altruism

Name: CHIEFDOM
Description: Hierarchy allows managing more people | Centralized Authority

Name: RELIGION_MYTH
Description: Shared stories bind strangers together | Common Belief

Name: BARTER_TRADE
Description: Direct exchange of goods | Coincidence of Wants

Name: CITY_STATE
Description: Dense population center with walls | Urbanization

Name: WRITTEN_LAW
Description: Rules carved in stone (Hammurabi) | Standardization of Justice

Name: SLAVERY_SERFDOM
Description: Forced labor powers early economy | Exploitation

Name: MONEY_COMMODITY
Description: Gold/Silver/Grain as universal value | Store of Value

Name: IMPERIAL_BUREAUCRACY
Description: Administering vast territory via scribes | Delegation

Name: ORGANIZED_ARMY
Description: Professional soldiers instead of mob | Discipline/Drill

Name: UNIVERSITY
Description: Community of scholars and teachers | Academic Freedom

Name: BANKING_SYSTEM
Description: Lending money at interest (Medici) | Credit Creation

Name: PATENT_COPYRIGHT
Description: Legal monopoly on invention | Intellectual Property

Name: JOINT_STOCK_CORP
Description: Shared ownership limits liability (VOC) | Risk Distribution

Name: NATION_STATE
Description: Sovereignty defined by borders and language | Nationalism

Name: PUBLIC_EDUCATION
Description: Standardized schooling for masses | Literacy/Obedience

Name: DEMOCRACY_REPRESENTATIVE
Description: Citizens vote for leaders | Feedback Loop

Name: FIAT_CURRENCY
Description: Money backed by state trust not gold | Monetary Policy

Name: INSURANCE
Description: Pooling risk against catastrophe | Probability/Actuarial Science

Name: CONSUMERISM
Description: Identity built on purchasing goods | Demand Generation

Name: GLOBAL_STANDARDS
Description: ISO/Metric system agreed globally | Interoperability

Name: WELFARE_STATE
Description: Safety net for citizens (Pension/Health) | Social Contract

Name: GLOBALIZATION
Description: Interconnected world economy | Comparative Advantage

Name: OPEN_SOURCE_CULTURE
Description: Free sharing of knowledge/code | Gift Economy

Name: GIG_ECONOMY
Description: Labor as a service on demand | Algorithmic Management

Name: SURVEILLANCE_CAPITALISM
Description: Personal data as raw material | Behavioral Prediction

Name: DECENTRALIZED_AUTONOMY
Description: Governance by code (DAO) | Consensus/Trustless
